vistra.framework.graph.item.state

Class EdgeStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • vistra.framework.graph.item.Item
        • vistra.framework.graph.item.Edge
          • vistra.framework.graph.item.LayoutEdge
            • vistra.framework.graph.item.state.EdgeStateHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEdge, IItem, ILayoutEdge, ILayoutItem, IEdgeStateHandler, IItemStateHandler

    public class EdgeStateHandler
extends LayoutEdge
implements IEdgeStateHandler
    An edge state handler.

    As being an item state handler, this handler has a stack as cellar at its disposal. It is therefore able to hold the state history and to set a previous state.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    IItemStateHandler, VertexStateHandler
